cards.title: Cadaver
setup: At the start of the game, {CadaverTeam} enters play “Corrupted Conjurer” side up.
{H - 3} copies of [i]Mesmerized Audience[/i] are put into play. The villain deck is shuffled.
gameplay: At the end of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, this card deals the hero with the most cards in play 2 infernal damage. Then, if there are no non-character targets in {CadaverTeam}'s play area, play the top card of {CadaverTeam}'s deck.
challengeText: Villain Haunt cards are immune to melee and projectile damage.
flippedGameplay: At the start of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, the hero target with the highest HP deals themself 2 psychic damage, then deals the hero target with the lowest HP 1 infernal damage.

openingLines.default: Enjoy the show everyone's dying to see!
openingLines.Angille.TheurgyCharacter: Ah my dear Lynsey. Glad you could make it. Too bad nobody else will. Make it. That is.
openingLines.Angille.TheurgyFateweaverCharacter: Oh, you've learned some things, haven't you? Well you can't possibly upstage me!
openingLines.Angille.SalemCharacter: I love the new look! Join me, put on the greatest show!

cards.title: Cadaverous Hat
body: Reduce damage dealt to haunt cards by 1.
Whenever a villain ongoing is destroyed, discard the top card of each hero deck.
At the end of their turn, a player may destroy one of their equipment cards. If they do so, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Who's his tailor?{BR}never mind, I don't care.{BR}That material's atrocious.

cards.flavorReference: Dana Bertrand, a night to forget (sof #23)

cards.title: Cadaverous Wand
body: Increase damage dealt by haunt cards by 1.
Whenever a villain target is destroyed, {CadaverTeam} deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 infernal damage.
Whenever a villain character is incapacitated, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Ok, he's good. I have no{BR}clue how he's doing some of these.

cards.title: Card Chicanery
body: Reveal the top card of each villain deck. Put any revealed targets into play and discard the rest. Targets that enter play this way deal themselves 1 irreducible psychic damage.
The player with the most cards in their trash shuffles their trash into their deck, then discards 2 cards.

cards.title: Demon Don
body: Increase infernal damage by 1.
At the end of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, this card deals the hero target with the second highest HP 3 fire damage and 1 infernal damage.
If [i]Red Rifle[/i] is active in this game, he cannot add tokens to his trueshot pool.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey bud! Crime's a bad look.{BR}Demonic summoning is, frankly, worse.

cards.title: Ditch
body: This card is immune to cold damage.

At the end of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage. Then, if [i]Patina[/i] is active in this game, destroy 1 hero ongoing card and 1 hero equipment card.

flavorQuotes.text: He's flooded downtown.{BR}we have to get there. [b]fast.[/b]

cards.title: Doku Mogura
body: At the end of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, this card deals each hero target 1 toxic and 1 melee damage.
If [i]What's-Her-Face[/i] is active in this game, the first time each turn this card would be dealt damage, redirect it to the villain target with the lowest HP outside of {CadaverTeam}'s play area.

flavorQuotes.text: Great. earthquakes, and now{BR}ninja moles. w. t. f.

cards.title: Gust
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card to 0.
At the end of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, this card deals X projectile damage to the hero character with the most cards in their hand, where X = the lower of {H + 1} or the number of cards in their hand.
If [i]NightMare[/i] is active in this game, whenever a card would be discarded move it to the bottom of its deck instead.

flavorQuotes.text: I cannae hit this one!{BR}ye wanna take a try?

cards.title: Hypnotic Pendulum
body: The first time each turn a hero card enters play, its player must either discard 2 cards or play the top card of a villain deck.
If a hero target deals itself damage, destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: Tyler Vance, a night to forget (sof #23)

cards.title: Knife Spinwheel
body: {CadaverTeam} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage.
[i]Lynne[/i] deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage.
cards.flavorReference: Maia Montgomery, a night to forget (sof #23)

cards.title: Lynne
body: At the start of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, each target in his play area gains 2 HP.
At the end of {CadaverTeam}'s turn, reveal the top card of {CadaverTeam}'s deck. If it is a one-shot, put it into play. Otherwise, discard it.
If [i]Theurgy[/i] is active in this game, whenever a hero card is played outside that hero's play area, this card deals each hero target 1 lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: put your hands together{BR}for my lovely assistant,{BR}[b]Lynne![/b]

cards.title: Mesmerized Audience
body: Play this card in the villain play area with the fewest copies of this card.
Reduce damage dealt to targets in this play area by 2.

At the end of their turn, if a player has skipped their play and power phases, they may discard a card to destroy this card. If this card is destroyed any other way, each hero target deals itself 2 psychic damage.

cards.title: Phantom Fright
body: The first time each turn a hero target deals damage to a villain target, this card deals that hero target 1 infernal and 1 psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: you ran into a [b]what!?[/b]{BR}I'm surprised you still have hair.

cards.title: Sawblade Table
body: {CadaverTeam} deals the non-haunt target with the lowest HP 5 melee damage.

If that target is destroyed this way, reveal cards from the top of {CadaverTeam}'s deck until a haunt card is revealed. Put it into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into {CadaverTeam}'s deck.

flavorQuotes.text: do you expect me to talk,{BR}mister cadaver?

cards.flavorReference: Felicia Fields, a night to forget (sof #23)

cards.title: Spectrous Spook
body: The first time each turn a villain target deals damage to a hero target, this card deals that hero target 1 infernal and 1 toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: elementals. furries.{BR}demons. dough monsters.{BR}ghosts seem almost tame now.
